Settlement.Name: Low End Creek
Settlement.Description: As there are very few humans left and resources are scarce, conflict is largely inevitable. However, reason mostly prevails and there is a tentative peace between settlements. Clans and tribes formed out of a sense of unity in this dying world, and relationships between them tend to be purely transactional.

0: Hello there mate, pleasure to meet ya!
Feelin a wee bit adventurous, are we?
How about a lil quest to spice up yer life ay?
1: Good, good. Off ya go then!
2: Well that's a real shame aint it. Guess we'll see each other around then. Take care!
